snippet.title: Our nostalgic helicopter game has a publisher! | Cleared Hot Trailer
snippet.description:
I grew up playing Microprose flight sims and today I get to announce that they're publishing Cleared Hot! 

We made a new trailer to celebrate, complete with new helicopters, new biomes, and new enemies. Cleared Hot was inspired by all the helicopter games of the 90s: Desert Strike (and the other Strike series), Return Fire, and even some early Battlefield mods. 

If you like the game, please Wishlist it on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1710820/Cleared_Hot/
